text: mahakasamandalira patha, yate ami musara upasyera prati drstipata karate pari, kinta ami nihsandeha take mithyabadi mane kari.â€™â€™ Ara e'ibhabe'i phira'a'unera jan'ya cittakarsaka kara hayechila tara kajera mandadikata, ara take nibrtta kara hayechila patha theke. Ara phira'a'unera phandi dhbansera madhye chara ara kichu naya.
